ai-setting.prompt-prefix-placeholder: Enter the prompt prefix for {aiName} under the current layout here. This prefix will be automatically incorporated into the question when asking.

messages.not-support-zoom: The current configuration does not support zooming
messages.no-plugin: No plugin detected, the Lambs AI Assistant may not be able to work!
messages.parse-json-failed: Configuration parsing failed. Please confirm that the configuration is in JSON format.
messages.key-changed-when-save: Modifying the key is not allowed during saving.
messages.no-current-when-remove: The current key does not exist, and cannot be deleted.
messages.key-exists-when-add: The current key already exists, and cannot be added.
messages.split-view-enabled-successfully: {aiName} has been successfully enabled in the split view.
messages.unable-find-ai-save-first: Unable to find Ai {aiKey}. If it hasn't been saved, please save it first.
messages.translate-engine-not-support: The current translation engine {engine} is not supported
messages.load-storage-error: An error occurred while loading local configuration: {error}. Falling back to default configuration, please try clearing LocalStorage or correcting the error.
messages.actived-playground-not-found: The activated playground was not found
messages.same-ai-selected: You cannot select two identical AI at the same time

more-ai-modal.free-definition: The definition of "free" is to provide more than 20 dialogues per day.
more-ai-modal.FNL-refers: "F & NL" refers to exemption from login, and after login, it provides more than 20 dialogues per day.
more-ai-modal.high-risk-tip: Pasting here at will is a high-risk operation, and the risk is borne by yourself.

ques-bar.auto-trans: For foreign models, automatically translate into English for questioning.
ques-bar.input: Feel free to ask. Press Shift+Enter to wrap text, and use the up and down arrow keys to select history.

setting.configuration-placeholder: This is the configuration JSON input box, which is currently not supported
setting.desc: The Lambs AI Assistant is a pure front-end web page that can simultaneously ask questions to multiple AI agents.
setting.plugin-tip: Due to browser limitations, the Lambs AI Assistant requires the installation of a Chrome or Edge plugin to function properly.
setting.login-tip: The interface of the Lambs AI Assistant does not allow for the login and logout actions of the AI agent. If you need to log in, please do so on the new tab. The assistant will automatically synchronize your account information (or follow the prompts within the assistant if necessary).

tour.step1: Click here to download the Chrome and Edge plugins
tour.step3: Open the Chrome extension management interface (Settings - Extensions - Manage Extensions)
tour.step4: Enable developer mode, as shown below
tour.step5: Click the "Load unpacked" button, and select the unzipped folder, as shown in the above image
tour.step6: Refresh this interface. Please note that login operations can only be performed in a separate tab (the tab of the newly created website itself)

svtour.title: Split View Mode Instructions
svtour.step1: Select an AI to enable in the split view on the top right of the Lambs AI assistant (e.g., Copilot), as shown below
svtour.step2: Right-click on the link where Copilot is located, and select "Open Link in Split View", as shown below
svtour.step3: Afterwards, we can utilize the native features of Chrome to adjust the width of the split view as we please
svtour.step4: Asking a question in the Lambs AI Assistant will automatically send the question to the AI in the split view

sstour.title: Split Screen Mode Instructions
sstour.step1: Select an AI to enable in the Split Screen on the top right of the Lambs AI assistant (e.g., Copilot), as shown below
sstour.step2: Right-click on the link where the AI name is located, and select "Open Link in split screen window", as shown below
sstour.step3: Note that for Edge, we must ensure that the Small Sheep AI assistant is on the right side of the split-screen window, and you can click "Switch left and right Tabs" from the More button in the top right corner of the window
sstour.step4: Afterwards, we can utilize the native features of Chrome to adjust the width of the Split Screen as we please
sstour.step5: Asking a question in the Lambs AI Assistant will automatically send the question to the AI in the Split Screen

typecheck.questionHistory: The value of the attribute `ini.questionHistory` can only be an array
typecheck.split_view-enabled: The value of the attribute `ini.split_view.enabled` can only be a boolean value
typecheck.ui-theme: The value of the property `ini.ui.theme` can only be `auto`, `light`, or `dark`
typecheck.ui-layout: The value of the attribute `ini.ui.layout` can only be `large_screen` or `small_screen`
typecheck.ui-header-position: The value of the attribute `ini.ui.header.position` can only be `top` or `left`
typecheck.ui-header-size: The value of the attribute `ini.ui.header.size` can only be `big`, `middle`, or `small`
typecheck.ui-layout_switching: The attribute `ini.ui.layout_switching` can only be an array
typecheck.ui-layout_switching-count: The attribute `ini.ui.layout_switching.count` can only be greater than 0
typecheck.ui-layout_switching-only-one: The attribute `ini.ui.layout_switching` can only have one activated item
typecheck.ui-layout_switching-required: The attribute `ini.ui.layout_switching` must have an activated item
typecheck.ui-playgrounds-pages: The property `ui.playgrounds.pages` must be an array
typecheck.ui-playgrounds-times: The attribute `ui.playgrounds.times` must be a number, representing the number of times of questioning
typecheck.ui-workspace: The attribute `ini.ui.workspace` can only be an array
typecheck.ui-workspace-actived-unique: The attribute `ini.ui.workspace` can only have one activated item
typecheck.ui-workspace-actived-required: The attribute `ini.ui.workspace` must have an activated item
typecheck.aios-key: The attribute `aios.key` of {aioName} must be equal to {aioKey}
typecheck.aios-cookies: If the attribute `aios.cookies` exists, it must be an array
typecheck.aios-storage: If the attribute `aios.storage` exists, it must be an array
typecheck.aios-extraCsp: If the attribute `aios.extraCsp` exists, it must be an array
typecheck.aios-fromChina: If the attribute `aios.fromChina` exists, it must be a boolean value
typecheck.aios-sendMsg: The property `aios.sendMsg` must be a function
typecheck.aios-onLoad: The property `aios.onLoad`, if it exists, must be a function
typecheck.aios-trans: The property `aios.trans`, if it exists, must be a function
